item.title: Computer Vision Playground
item.description: A computer vision playground to try and test end to end(test to deploy) computer vision pipeline. We are looking for open source enthusiasts to help advance the project, to know more click on contribute.

item.title: Object Detection
item.description: Object detection usin OPenCV’s dnn module a mobilenet model trianed on caffe.

item.title: Face Recognition using Python and OpenCV Haarcascades
item.description: Implementing simple facial recognition using Haarcascades and OpenCV

item.title: Optical Flow using OpenCV and Python
item.description: An implementation of optical flow tracker using lucas-k : calcOpticalFlowPyrLK() method in OpenCV.

item.title: Canny Edge Detection using OpenCV and C++
item.description: implementing canny edge detection from OpenCV with noise reduction, intensity gradient of image, non-maxima suppression and hysterisis thresholding

item.title: Find Dominant Color from an image using OpenCV and C++
item.description: Finding dominant color in an image with the help of quantization and eigne value.
